results.title: Evaluating the Effects of Oral and Topical Simvastatin in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Comparing the three groups showed that topical @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was associated with greater decrease in @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@ severity as compared with those of oral and placebo groups.

citations.NLM: Ahmadvand A, Yazdanfar A, Yasrebifar F, Mohammadi Y, Mahjub R, Mehrpooya M. Evaluating the Effects of Oral and Topical Simvastatin in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial. Curr Clin Pharmacol. 2018;13(4):279-283. PMID: 30129417
citations.BibTeX: @article{30129417, title={Evaluating the Effects of Oral and Topical Simvastatin in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris: A Double-blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial.}, author={Ahmadvand A and Yazdanfar A and Yasrebifar F and Mohammadi Y and Mahjub R and Mehrpooya M}, journal={Curr Clin Pharmacol}, volume={13}, number={4}, pages={279-283}}

results.title: Effects of simvastatin and metformin on polycystic ovary syndrome after six months of treatment.
results.text_hl: Total @CHEMICAL_Testosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013739 @@@testosterone@@@ decreased significantly and comparably in all groups: by 25.6, 25.6, and 20.1% in the S, M, and SM groups, respectively. Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ improved menstrual cyclicity and decreased @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@, ovarian volume, body mass index, @GENE_CRP @GENE_1401 @@@C-reactive protein@@@, and soluble @GENE_VCAM1 @GENE_7412 @@@vascular cell adhesion molecule-1@@@.

citations.NLM: Banaszewska B, Pawelczyk L, Spaczynski RZ, Duleba AJ. Effects of simvastatin and metformin on polycystic ovary syndrome after six months of treatment. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2011 Nov;96(11):3493-501. PMID: 21865358
citations.BibTeX: @article{21865358, title={Effects of simvastatin and metformin on polycystic ovary syndrome after six months of treatment.}, author={Banaszewska B and Pawelczyk L and Spaczynski RZ and Duleba AJ}, journal={J Clin Endocrinol Metab}, volume={96}, number={11}, pages={3493-501}}

results.title: Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome.
results.text_hl: Improved menstrual regularity and decreased @DISEASE_Hirsutism @DISEASE_MESH:D006628 @@@hirsutism@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Acne_Vulgaris</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000152 @@@acne@@@, ovarian volume, and BMI had been significantly noticed in the study groups A and C, although still relatively higher in group C.

citations.NLM: Seyam E, Hefzy E. Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome. Gynecol Endocrinol. 2018 Dec;34(12):1073-1080. PMID: 30044162
citations.BibTeX: @article{30044162, title={Long-term effects of combined simvastatin and metformin treatment on the clinical abnormalities and ovulation dysfunction in single young women with polycystic ovary syndrome.}, author={Seyam E and Hefzy E}, journal={Gynecol Endocrinol}, volume={34}, number={12}, pages={1073-1080}}
